news.title: Jess Glynne slams White House for using her viral "Jet2 holiday" song to promote ICE deportations
news.summary: "My music is about love, unity, and spreading positivity — never about division or hate," Glynne said.

news.title: Bryson Tiller to release first half of double album
news.summary: The double album release Solace & The Vices coincides with the ten-year anniversary of his 2015 hit project T R A P S O U L

news.title: Electric Picnic announce Comedy Arena line-up featuring Dara Ó Briain
news.summary: See the Comedy Arena line-up below.

news.title: Live Report: Mogwai, July 26, Vicar Street
news.summary: Scottish alt-rock icons Mogwai offered a bruisingly intense spectacle of glorious noise on their first of two nights in Vicar Street this Saturday.

news.title: Foo Fighters enlist new drummer Ilan Rubin to replace Josh Freese
news.summary: Rubin has been touring with Nine Inch Nails since 2009.

news.title: 50 years ago today: Remembering The Miami Showband Massacre
news.summary: To mark the 50th anniversary of the Miami Showband massacre, we're sharing an extract from Niall Stokes' The Message – in which he reflects on the "gruesome act of sickening butchery" that took place on July 31, 1975...

news.title: RTÉ Arena presenter Seán Rocks has died, aged 63
news.summary: Rocks presented RTÉ's flagship arts and culture programme, Arena, since its inception in 2009
